condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: 1,600 children aged 0-5 years received 60 cartons of RUTF, 10 tins of F-100, 1,800 vitamin-A capsules, and 1 carton of MNP in 8 cared centers in Talasea district of West New Britain province following the volcanic eruption from Mt Ulawun. 30 Health workers received IMAM training in Talasea district. 20 cartoons of nutrition supplies sent to Kiunga district in Western province to be used for the refugees arrived from West Papua province of Indonesia. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:17/01/2020
